definitions.definition: Flat area of land or plateau higher than other land, with one or more clifflike edges.
examples: A few more miles of hot sand and gravel and red stone brought us around a low mesa to the Little Colorado River.

definitions.definition: a structure with components rising above the insulating substrate that surrounds it
examples: The ohmic contacts were deposited at the edge of the mesa .

main_definition: Flat area of land or plateau higher than other land, with one or more clifflike edges.
secondary_definitions: ( electronics ) a structure with components rising above the insulating substrate that surrounds it
